Review.Contenu: Charged me 33 dollars for something that costs less than 2 dollars for Filipinos. Asked them to make it partially right, they refused. 1600% mark-up. I have done a lot of "loads" but this was by far the worst of the worst.. Terrible company..

Review.Pseudo: Relaxing Your Mind and Soul Ch
Review.Contenu: I order for 1000pesos, then after ordering 4times they decided to verify again, at the time of mobile banking is not available ive submitted to them the card number and other docs still they did put on hold the amount.. now ive submitted the bankstatement they are holding it. It was charge already to bankstatement. What a bunch of thief i will never used this service anymore.. This is my case no. 12391235 you send me email and you told me that my order was put on hold because you need a screenshot of mobile banking that was charged that time it was not available but i submitted all other documents but you told me its your policy to do this and this. Ive reply to the same email that you send but you did not reply.. i dont know what happen to that purchase load as that number is now not working so i dont have anything to verify if that amount was loaded as far as i know you put it on hold on that timeI have given all the details of my wife i even attached our marriage contract her passport id and bank details... And she was the one who told me to purchase load, anyways as long as you will refund we are happy.. thanks and have a wonderful day.

The reception was terrible. The entire call I heard my own voice echoed- it was difficult to carry a conversation with the bounce back effect going on the whole time. Not only that, but even with me signing up to get charged for minutes so as not  to drop calls, they still drop the calls, THEN email me an invoice informing me they refilled my minutes. I will use a different company next time.

your application is not safe.  the CVV number is visible on ur application while it will be only shown in *** sign. any hacker can  see the card detail.  and no bank security on ur application.earlier someone theft my credit card detail and made 17 attempt to use my card. thanks to my bank that they block my card. i will never use this site in future

I was very disappointed with my calls. Even though the phone didn't ring, my minutes would be deducted. I didn't even get to speak to anyone and my minutes was still getting deducted. It was a waste of money. It not only happened once, but it has happened to me several times already. I hope the company does something about this matter.

The line was not clear, i wasted money for this service. My experienced using this app  was not acceptable anymore. I still need to repeat many times what i was saying. It's been like this for many times. When i make calls i needed to re dial again and again bcoz the other party can't hear me..or sometimes i thought i talked to my loved one's but it was a diffrent person on the other line. That was real..really crazy!!

I haven't purchase from your site for a long time. We had a death in the family and I was in a real pinch thats why I bought voice credits again. Tried again and it kept saying that they cant recognize my pin number 4x and the 5th time that it did connect- it took so long to be able to get connected to the cellphone. I am really sorry for this review but I feel that you should know to be able to improve your service. Thank you.

are they real? Review.Titre: When I renewed or topped up this  time
Review.Contenu: When I renewed or topped up this  time, I wanted to buy the same package I had bought the month before. The plan I had bought before worked really well for us. Sadly it did not appear to be availible this time . When I purchased it there was no no mention of it being a special offer or sale. The carrier was Smart the plan was 800mb per day for 30 days plus 1 gb per day for you tube etc.price was approx $21.00 us it was a data plan. Did I miss this somehow? i want to repurchase.

Review.Titre: The line was not so clear..i was…

I called again and someone i don't know answer the line and it was gone.. i'm kinda frustrated and disappointment with this provider bcoz it's been like this for a very long time. I don't know what's going on with tawag pinas anymore. Hopefully, they will fix their line.

Service is slipping to bad. Having too many pending status. Needs to be instantly sent once its bought. I have to send call back request too often. But use other services that are quick and easy when this service isnt up for the job. Used to be really simple click and send load to my family and friends In Philippines but lately haven't used this service due to the lack of quality and dependability of the services.

It has been working fine the last 3 yrs i'm using it but today,sept 2019 in France,tried using it and i keep getting ''the code entered is invalid'' and the number you dialled is incorrect,it was ridiculous,!i memories my pin code and the number i am calling,keep dialling for an hour and tried all the access numbers within France and keep getting the same error,fix it!i have been a loyal client for the past 3 yrs!

First off, you guys take too long to process orders.Secondly when you call in to talk to any of your associates either they're short crude or rude or they don't speak English very well.Thirdly the transfers or the load as you guys put it, in some cases take way too long to show up on the phones.I doubt seriously if I'll hear back from anybody about this survey but if you feel you have the courage to contact me my phone number is818-378-7008Thanks for taking the time

Review.Titre: its hard to use because I have to use…
Review.Contenu: its hard to use because I have to use Java app. So many times, everytime I try to call my family. i have to re-run/install Java. I just add some money. I know its not enough but I dont know if i am able to use it because it wants me to .....once again re-install Java. my computer is not accepting it because of virus issue. I guess i loose that time to contact my relative again!!! and one more thing why is it your website does not work with chrome. why does It have to open to internet explorer????? your site is not user friendly!!!

I am charged for calls when they do not connect, the call quality is often poor which means I have to stop the call & ring again,  the connection is often lost & I get that annoying message telling me to enter the number again. Using Tawag Pinas can be very frustrating.  The cost per call is expensive and I lose a lot of my credit for the reasons mentioned above. It is poor value.

Review.Titre: This is happen everytime when I make a…
Review.Contenu: This is happen everytime when I make a phone call back home (cebu philippines) into their landline. Everytime I dialed their land line # it would ring once then it prompted me to this automated message qoute( sorry chuchu i (forgot the next word) then followed by this is a voice mail application) so I just hang up. In the past I was able to connect to their home phone.  I don't know what's going on. My parent's had the pldt came into the house to fix the line.  I still have problem with landline connections. Thank you,

Using the service to call the Philippines can make you pull out all of your hair.  Many times it does not connect, or it takes over 3 min to get a call to connect.  Multiple times it not only connected to the wrong number, but to the wrong country.  The sound quality is poor except the rare occasion when it is actually half way decent.  The site only post positive reviews with no way of posting your own review, which leads me to believe the reviews are fake, or filtered to show only positives.

I was first connected with someone in France. Of course, the clock was ticking down my minutes, even if I got a wrong connection. After this, tt was only on my 3rd or 4th attempt that I got my desired party on. To say the least, we had to shout at each other. I ended my call abruptly.

Kind of expensive especially calling cell phone numbers in the Philippines considering that few people there have landlines.  Then it is very very annoying that if a phone just rings or if I want to make another call directly after, or if the phone number if busy, that I have to hang up then redial tawagpinas before calling another number.        Why hasn't tawagpinas allowed the caller to push, for example ##, to call a different phone number.  Finally, it is not uncommon for a phone to ring or to get a strange incorrect number where no one answers but get a voice recording is no good, and yet tawagpinas charges a minute for the call.

Honestly, the only reason I stay with them is because they have very good customer service. But the product itself not very good.  It can take up to 3 days to get a call to connect.  Also majority of the time the call quality is not all that good.

Review.Titre: I lost more than $5 by calling certain…
Review.Contenu: I lost more than $5 by calling certain phone number in the Philippines that call never answered but my credit was charged more than $5.00 for repeated calls I made. It was really insane that charges were made without any connection.

Review.Titre: i ordered for a reload but was not…
Review.Contenu: i ordered for a reload but was not delivered due to technical problems. I emailed my problems 4 times and requested for a call since they do not have a number to call to but the call never came not even a reply to my email

Four problems with Tawagpinas:1. The system quickly shuts down if you have dialed the wrong number with a sarcastic "goodbye" followed by a dial tone.2. There is no way after you finish a call if you want to dial another number. You have to hang up and dial the other number.  Why can't Tawagpinas allow the caller to push # or something like that to be able to dial another number??3. It is not uncommon to place a call that doesn't go through or you get a strange recording including ones that say the person is out of area, and yet Tawagpinas charges the customer for the call.4. finally, the rates to the Philippines are too high.  Tawagpinas knows that most calls are to cellphone which have higher rates than calls to landlines.

Review.Titre: Your online service for follow up on…
Review.Contenu: Your online service for follow up on order was lacking. I requested information on chat site along with phone calls and you neither wanted to respond or were not interested

Review.Titre: The review is based on the last holiday calls of 2019
Review.Contenu: The review is based on the last calls I'd had during the previous Christmas/New year holidays. I have been using tawagpinas for some years and don't have any bad experience until lately. First, there is limited access #s now, the one I used to use is no longer working (856) so I have to research another access # (732). Then dialing my family in the Philippines is tough getting a connection and when I did, a lot of times the connection disconnects in middle of conversation. Other times I have noticed too is when it rang on the other side but didn't get any connection, the minute was reduced. Hope that this recent experience will help tawagpinas improve their service. I am not sure though if its only because of the holidays, but in any case, they should have anticipated more volume during this season.

Review.Titre: Charge from my paypal acct every time I…
Review.Contenu: Charge from my paypal acct every time I call to philippines, even I still have enough money to call. And I indeed cancel my bank acct from pay pal, because of these.😡
I received an email with a discount and I am not sure if it was applied to the $5 voice credit I purchased.  It seemed that airtime was the same as one without the discount.
The connections are poor, I keep getting charged for bad connections, and even ones that never even connected.  If I could find a different service I would change.

Review.Titre: Can’t make any phone calls when I’m not…
Review.Contenu: Can’t make any phone calls when I’m not connected to wifi tho I have a strong cellular data signal. But perfectly works when I’m connected to wifi.

Review.Titre: It's used to be inexpensive calling…
Review.Contenu: It's used to be inexpensive calling apps but  as I use it longer my call time is not worth the money I'm spending. Not worth it anymore.
Sometimes i cant get through sßometimes you cant hear very well or big delays...But most of the time it saves money.I will keep using tawagpinas

Review.Titre: Biggest problem is that I often get…
Review.Contenu: Biggest problem is that I often get charged when i don't get a live voice or aren't able to leave a message.  It's a headache to have to call TawagPinas for credit for 12-15 cents even though it's TawagPinas who benefits when a lot of people get charged for calls where there was no answer.Then when a call doesn't go through or after a successful call, why doesn't TawagPinas allow me to make another call without having to hang up and redial?  That's a real headache.Then when i have enough balance to make a 1 or 2 minute call, TawagPinas will interrupt the call to tell me my balance is low.  This is annoying.  I wish they would stop doing that. After all they tell me at the start of the call what my balance is, so why are they interrupting my call to try to get me to add more money??  Also, I wish they would allow me to add $2 if i choose to do so while on the phone.  Their minimum is $5.Finally, I feel their rates to the Philippines are a bit on the high side.
If you can fix the problem on the access numbers,, everytime I call, all access  numbers have same message & can't  connect.
It charges my account even though, my call didn’t go through.  Annoying to call customer service all the time to get a credit.
When I first used this service it was perfect but now it isn't that good anymore always drop out cannot heard on the other line.

Calls dont connect right away, have to dial multiple times ,then alot of drop calls

Review.Titre: Not too bad but too many charges for missed calls
Review.Contenu: Not too bad.  But there are too many dropped calls or calls where the phone just rings and yet TawagPinas charged for those.  It's a headache to have to call in each time I am charged for 1 min for a call where the phone just rings.  It still costs me 15 cents to call the Philippines.  TawagPinas needs to make sure that their system is better able to detect missed calls!

Review.Titre: I have to state since my last review …
Review.Contenu: I have to state since my last review this group has made major improvements.  But I still do have some issues time to time, of calls that one side can not hear the other, or the call does not complete, but I get charged for it.  I do have to state those issues are not as often as before.  So I am giving a 3 star for today, and will see if they continue to improve.

Review.Titre: Customer service should be more visible…
Review.Contenu: Customer service should be more visible  in assisting customers.  Many if us are not tech literate, therefore when we want to buy credit, they should be able to do that for them. You should have more promotions like other companies. Other companies offer 15% discount with no limit on the amount of the purchase.

Pretty good.  Easy to buy credit.  Usually reasonably good quality.  But Philippines always seem to cost so much more than any other surrounding country which is a bit of a shame.  Especially, as hardly any of them have landlines.  Went up from 8.5 pence to 9.9 pence rather quickly.  Maybe four stars would have been more fair, but I will not give ANY provider a good mark while they charge so much for one particular country. Will continue to use them, nonetheless

Review.Titre: I got deducted a minute or 2 for a …
Review.Contenu: I got deducted a minute or 2 for a phone call that never connected through. This happened almost always, whenever I call the Philippines. I wanted to complain but I though It was a waste of time airing my complaint. So I though of writing this to somehow let you know that this issue is happening. I hope you will resolve this issue right away so that your client will be satisfied with your service and thereby, continue to patronize your product/s. Thank you for taking the time to listen.

Review.Titre: Inexpensive rates but difficult to connect and sometimes noisy
Review.Contenu: I give it a 2.5 stars because half my calls are not perfect.  Based on experience, calls usually connect at 50% at a time.  The first call doesn't connect.  I need to hang up and dial again.  There also seems to be noise  when calling a land line outside Metro Manila.  The receiver can barely hear my voice so I need to shout.  While I hear the other party but white noise comes in so our conversation is never completed.  The service has a lot on convenient features like pinless dialing and  1 touch shortcuts.  But connection and call quality needs improvement.

Good Reload Company; however; while other concerns reload instantly-- this company consistently places you in  " account review" or " similar " -- and while that is going on for 4 or 5 hours, I have already reloaded at another online concern.

Review.Titre: I think the prices are still somewhat…

Review.Titre: The quality of the calls are really clear
Review.Contenu: The quality of the calls are really clear and good.Customer service via email is quick and responsive. I really appreciate it.The only reason I did not give it a 5 star is because of one issue in the system. When the call is 'failed attempt' (this is the term used by customer service), this is when you call and it will say '... voice mail', it would deduct 10 cents automatically. So x numbers of call with that adds up. The thing is, customer service was fast and said they will credit back (and they did) and to let me now if problem persists. It is good that credit is given back, HOWEVER, If they already know that this is a problem, just FIX the system to NOT charge when this happens instead of having the customer message everytime and asking for credit back.

Review.Titre: I only rated TawagPinas 4 stars this…
Review.Contenu: I only rated TawagPinas 4 stars this time around.  The last time I rated it 5 stars.  The reason for the lower rating is I noticed that they are now charging my account as minutes used for "no answer" -- this is when you try to call someone & the person you're calling never picks up or answers.... the phone just rings.  Not sure why they are charging minutes for this now.... they weren't doing it before Jun/Jul 2021..... so why the change now..... I don't think it's right to charge minutes for "no answer" calls!!
YES I M ENJOYING USNG TAWAGPINAS. AND PAYPAL OPTION HAS MADE MY THINGS MORE EASY AND SAFE. I WILL RECOMMEND TO USE THIS SITE FOR COMMUNICATION IN THE PHILIPPINES. THANKS.

I'd rather top them up with lesser load amount. cheaper that way!
NOT BAD. I can reach the one I am intending to call.

The only problem I have with this service is when you hit the send button it does not tell you that your transaction is complete. It usually takes about 20 minutes to get an email saying it is complete. The first time I used this service I did not think it went through so I did it again only to find out 20 minutes later I had topped up my friends phone 2 times.

TawagPinas works great. Currently it has the options for 300, 500 and 1000 peso loads for Smart and Globe that I've used. The do have 3 other options including Sun. The only reason why it's a 4 star rating and not 5 stars is I believe they should have a 50, 100 and 200 peso options too.Double check with you recipient that they got the load.

I would like to share that my first time to use tawagpinas is a little complicated beacuse of the delayed reload but now i like it because they improve already, but one thing i can suggest is why you dont have any percent discount, i am buying every month but until now you dont have any discount to your costumers, Thank you for your service and Good luck!

Review.Titre: Good site. App needs a quick load feature.
Review.Contenu: The tawagpinas com website works great.I tried the Android app, but it only allowed me to buy talk time, and I don't really use my phone for that. I just want to load my sim card. (The phone is my Internet modem.) I'd like the app to show me a list of my usual transactions and let me say This number, This amount, This credit card, boom, done.

Review.Titre: This is a great way to sent load to …
Review.Contenu: This is a great way to sent load to your love ones in the Philippines. Just one simple advise, if you are paying with PayPal, pay attention they don't ask confirmation. This is good to know so you don't have the same I had. I thought a confirmation would be asked so I tried to sent load many times. My wife get it also several times.

Review.Titre: I like the fact that you don't need a…
Review.Contenu: I like the fact that you don't need a code to call just dial the country code and number you are calling.Reception is clear.I just don't like that when your minutes is up.It warns you but it's at the end and hangs up immediately.It would be nice to warn you 1 minute away so you can end the conversation properly.

Adds mobile phone credit in less than a minute. Easy payment by PayPal, but can use credit card. You need to know which network the mobile number is registered with. I once got this wrong, which became apparent to me when the process stuck on "Pending". I emailed TawagPinas and it was promptly sorted out. Only downside to TawagPinas is the cost, poor exchange rate plus a handling fee. But it works well so I use it.

Review.Titre: Like it for the most part - couple of suggestions
Review.Contenu: I have a couple of friends and a fiance in the Philippines.  I send load to their phones frequently.  I love that I have one single site that can do the 3 major cell carriers in Phil.  But the biggest problem that I have is that I sometimes make a mistake as to which carrier the number belongs to.  It would be so much more convenient if the number verification process also verified the carrier.  When I make a mistake it takes days for the process to fail and then finally refund to my account.

Great and awesome! I got few issues before like calls not going through and at the same time being charged a minute or 2 for dropped calls and slow connection. But overall, I like Tawag Pinas for being available when I needed to call some relatives or friends in the other side of the globe.

Sometimes the calls get dropped and my wife and I think it would be much better to have a phone number to call about the issue rather than submitting a "ticket" via the webpage. The response time to provide credit for dropped calls is pretty quick though, but we would rather talk to a live person.

If you have used calling card types services  before, you know this is where the company robes you, all the other wording is just hype to get you to buy. TawagPinas is great and has no hidden fees and therefore your dollars go further so you can talk longer to those who you love. Thanks TawagPinas

Review.Titre: I been using this app since months now…
Review.Contenu: I been using this app since months now It is very good and cheap to make phone calls, I call in China every day and it works ok except some I lost the communication I call back than it works it maybe not the app it self it can be cause by the network in China, I recommend

I've been using TawagPinas for a few months now. For the most part the calls are decent. Sometimes, I can hear an echo. I can always connect with my loved ones in the Philippines. The rates are very reasonable. It is very easy to buy more minutes. My whole family in the U.S. is now using TawagPinas.

I was really amazed when I first search an online site about "cheapest call rate/idd from USA to Philippines. It was good and worth it. But I hope if we users purchase voice credit often times we gonna have discounts or incentives so that we can have more time to talk with our family. 😊

Review.Titre: I’ve used tawag pinas for a long time…
Review.Contenu: I’ve used tawag pinas for a long time now and really love the serve. I give it 4/5 stars only because the service charge is way more than it should cost when dealing in Philippine currency. Cut the service charge in half and I would rate 5/5.

Sometimes site is unavailable and when you are talking to someone on the phone there are several times you get a weird sound ( noise) and then you get disconnected.Otherwise its good ,it's cheap,it's a plus.Thank You.

it is a low cost, easy call that helps a lot to call loved ones in the Philippines , even though sometimes got static  and sorry to say, seldom happens that we are not heard by our contact. Anyway, it is highly recommended way of vommunication.

I make 2 to 3 calls per week to the Philippines, this app provides average call quality with only a split second delay. The rates are way lower than any package or PPM rates I could get from AT&T. Plus I get to refill with PayPal.

Experienced good quality conversations during calls but lately I have been hearing voice intervention of access number in the middle of conversations saying that the number I called is not responding thus ending the call prematurely.
Service & speed are excellent, but your charges/exchange rate needs improvement, 500 pesos equals £7.84 official rate, but you chasrge £10.15 including your charges, a difference of nearly 30%
Great thing there is tawag pinas, I can call anytime in the Philippines with good quality of communications and I think it's more affordable it's rate per minute so it's interesting.

Review.Titre: Nice price but sometimes connects to a wrong number

Our service will always connect you to the number you dial, so please make sure you dial the number you want to reach correctly and in international format.Your TawagPinas teamREPLY TO TAWAGPINAS TEAM:NO, your service does not always connect me to the number I dial, 4 times now I have been connect to a man speaking arabic, and he is not in the Philippines. The number I always use is programmed as speed dial in your app.Otherwise, the service works well and I am very satisfied with the calls that do connect properly.Thanks

Review.Titre: Used For Six Years... Great Quality And Value
Review.Contenu: We have been using KeepCalling (TawagPinas) for the last six years to phone the Philippines from the UK. We have always been impressed by the quality of the calls and their pricing. Occasionally I do check around to see if there are any cheaper deals, and when they are available we do try them out, but the call quality always seems to suffer and we end up going back to KeepCalling. I cannot recommend this calling service highly enough.

Most if not all of the telco operators are available; payment is double checked against credit card fraudsters and invoice is sent after few minutes the load has been delivered. The higher commissions are well deserved. Fully satisfied
I've been using Tawag Pinas for several years. Mostly to keep in contact with Philippine family. Never had any problems. Fast clear connections at low cost. Top notch.

I was able to reached the intended party right away. Communicated the purpose of my call with no interruptions. Phone lines were clear. My time wasn’t wasted. I’ve been using Tawag Pinas to place important international calls to the Philippines. They never disappointed me.

Sometimes calls are clear and sometimes choppy. Call drops are becoming common using TawagPinas. Calling TawagPinas representative can be a convenient option since their representatives can resolve drop calls, usually giving some credit in my account in the event of drop calls. The good thing about this is that TawagPinas gives me the rewards for the purchases and calls made. This is an awesome plus for those using TawagPinas.
